item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description:
"I'd sell my soul to have you. In my whole life, you'll always be what I wanted most."
~ Hardy Cates" -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "I no longer believed in the idea of soul mates, or love at first sight. But I was beginning to believe that a very few times in your life, if you were lucky, you might meet someone who was exactly right for you. Not because he was perfect, or because you were, but because your combined flaws were arranged in a way that allowed two separate beings to hinge together." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "You are not a perfect woman.You have an evil temper, you’re as blind as a mole, you’re a deplorable poet, and frankly, your French accent could use some work.” Supporting himself on his elbows, Leo took her face in his hands. “But when I put those things together with the rest of you, it makes you into the most perfectly imperfect woman I’ve ever known." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I know you aren't perfect. But it's a person's imperfections that make them perfect for someone else." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: "Jika cinta bisa membuat seorang perempuan setia pada satu lelaki, kenapa cinta tidak bisa membuat lelaki bertahan dengan satu perempuan?" -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Menjadi bahagia bukan bagaimana bisa tersenyum, tapi bagaimana menerima dengan hati lapang." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Berusaha berhenti mencintaimu lebih sulit daripada memulainya." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Maaf…” kata Sarah pelan. Nabil mengusap pipi Sarah. “Jangan nangis…” bisiknya. Sarah memeluknya. Dia terisak di dada Nabil. Air matanya terus mengalir seiring hujan yang semakin deras. Nabil ikut memeluknya erat, tidak sanggup melihat ini. “Jangan nangis, Sarah…” bisiknya lagi." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Cinta itu terlalu sederhana. Terkadang, kata-kata menjadi terlalu rumit untuk mengungkapkannya." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Aku percaya, tak pernah ada kata salah untuk cinta." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Aku ingin bahagia. Dan, aku berhak bahagia--tanpamu." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Aku nggak mencari pembenaran apa pun lagi, Mira. Satu hal yang benar adalah aku mencintai kamu. Aku sangat mencintai kamu. Sejak sepuluh tahun lalu." Rayhan" -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "Sometimes a woman needs a man for company, no matter how useless he is." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "I love you, Marks. My heart is completely and utterly yours. And unfortunately for you, the rest of me comes with it." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "I want you any way I can get you. Not because you’re beautiful or clever or kind or adorable, although devil knows you’re all those things. I want you because there’s no one else like you, and I don’t ever want to start a day without seeing you." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: " Allah, bersama-Mu tak ada jalan buntu " -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: "Perempuan, Kau pasti tahu sakitnya cinta yg tak terkatakan.Cinta yg hanya mampu didekap dlm bungkam, Kata orang bahkan diam berbicara. Tapi, menurutku hal itu tdk berlaku dlm cinta. Sebab cinta harus diekspresikan dan pantang dibawa diam. Sebab cinta harusnya dinyatakan, lalu dibuktikan dgn sikap.Bgtu seharusnya cinta.Tapi, aku memang tidak punya pilihan. Maafkan!" -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: "Di setiap udara yang kau temukan, Di sana akan kau jumpai Allah yang senantiasa mendengar doamu" -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description:
"Maafkan Jika senyumku Tersembunyi dibalik air mata Dan kata-kata mesra Menjadi tanpa daya Karena terperangkap Dalam Prasangka
Tapi Tuhan Tahu.. Cinta yang kupunya Lebih berwarna Dari yang kau kira" -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Farah Hidayati
item.description: "Manusia tidak memilih tempat dia dilahirkan Tapi bisa memilih siapa yang dipercayai Pun rasa percaya bisa mengkhianatimu" -- Farah Hidayati

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Raditya Dika
item.description: "Apa yang harus kita lakukan pada kenangan yang memaksa untuk terus diingat?" -- Raditya Dika

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Tuhan membiarkan kita kalah supaya kita tahu di mana letak kita salah." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Hidup adalah pilihan. Jika tidak segera memilih, hidup akan memilihkan jalannya dan tidak tahu kemana arahnya." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Saat Tuhan menutup satu pintu, Tuhan membuka pintu yang lain. Kamu mungkin nggak pernah tahu karena terlalu sibuk mengurusi hidup yang sudah tertutup itu." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "I believe in you as well as I believe in us." -- Sefryana Khairil

item.title: Sefryana add a quote by Sefryana Khairil
item.description: "Saat tergugu dan ragu, Tuhan menghadiahi kamu. Kamu, yang membawaku ke dunia baru. Kamu, yang membuatku tahu, tak perlu apa-apa untuk memulai sesuatu. Karena aku telah di sini, denganmu." -- Sefryana Khairil
